snippet: St. Louis’s Jake Allen made 24 saves for his second straight shutout.
abstract: NHL Roundup; St Louis Blues defeat New Jersey Devils, 2-0; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: St. Louis’s Jake Allen made 24 saves for his second straight shutout.

headline.print_headline: Second Straight Shutout Carries Blues Over Devils
headline.main: As Goalie Shines Again, Blues Shut Out the Devils
